title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Amount in million U.S. dollars, with a total of 3 data points.
Overall Amount in million U.S. dollars has increased over the Year
Amount in million U.S. dollars is slightly constant from 2014 to 2016.
The steepest stays the same occurs in between the Year 2014 and 2015.
Max Amount in million U.S. dollars about 762.52 was recorded at Year 2015
Min Amount in million U.S. dollars about 597.14 was recorded at Year 2014
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Amount in million U.S. dollars, with a total of 3 data points. The chart has 2 significant trends.
The longest trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2014 to 2016.
On the contrary, the next significant trend is slightly increasing which exists from 2016 to 2016.
